data.eml:eml: Two new genera and species of chiltoniid amphipods (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Talitroidea) from freshwater mound springs in South Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article King, Rachael A. (2009): Two new genera and species of chiltoniid amphipods (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Talitroidea) from freshwater mound springs in South Australia. Zootaxa 2293: 35-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191467
